tour_name: Corsican Coastal Splendor & Lavender Fields of Provence

sections.title: Corsican Coastal Delights: Ajaccio & Scandola Reserve
sections.content: Begin your Corsican adventure in Ajaccio, Napoleon's birthplace. Settle into your 5-star haven overlooking the Mediterranean. Explore iconic beaches, delve into history at sites like Filitosa, and embark on a private boat tour to the Reserve Naturelle de Scandola, a UNESCO World Heritage site, witnessing its dramatic landscapes and diverse wildlife. Indulge in sunset cocktails at a beachfront bar, savoring the romantic ambiance of the Mediterranean.

sections.title: Corsican Mountain & Coastal Escapes: Calvi & Agriates Desert
sections.content: Journey to Calvi, a charming town dominated by a 16th-century citadel. Experience the rugged beauty of the Desert des Agriates with a private horseback riding excursion, traversing through wildflower-covered landscapes. Discover secluded beaches like Plage de Ravelletta, perfect for a private picnic and sunbathing. Conclude your days with gourmet dining experiences at local restaurants, savoring the flavors of Corsican cuisine.

sections.title: Provence Lavender Fields: Luberon Immersion
sections.content: Fly by private charter to Provence and enter a world of vibrant colors amidst the lavender fields. Settle into a luxurious boutique hotel ideally located in the Luberon region. Explore the enchanting villages of Gordes and Roussillon, each with unique charm and breathtaking views. Capture romantic moments with a private photoshoot amidst the lavender fields, followed by a romantic dinner under the stars, surrounded by the fragrant beauty of Provence.

sections.title: Cultural & Culinary Provence: Avignon & Wine Country
sections.content: Explore the historic city of Avignon, home to the magnificent Papal Palace. Immerse yourselves in the local culture by browsing artisanal goods at local markets. Embark on exclusive wine tastings at renowned vineyards, sampling the region's finest wines. Culminate your culinary journey with an unforgettable evening at a Michelin-starred restaurant, savoring the exquisite flavors of Provençal cuisine and celebrating your honeymoon with a truly exceptional dining experience.
